dcterms:creator: W. L. Hamilton
R. Ying
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A collection of posts from the Reddit forum, forming a post-to-post graph where each node represents a post linked by comments from the same user. The labels indicate their respective communities.
dcterms:title: Reddit

dcterms:creator: W. Hu
M. Fey
M. Zitnik
Y. Dong
H. Ren
B. Liu
M. Catasta
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A co-purchasing network featuring products where each node represents a product, and edges indicate common purchases. The labels correspond to product categories.
dcterms:title: ogbn-products

dcterms:creator: J. McAuley
R. Pandey
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A network of products from Amazon's Clothing, Shoes, and Jewelry categories, where nodes represent products and edges connect products viewed by the same user. Labels are based on fine-grained product subcategories.
dcterms:title: Amazon-Clothing

dcterms:creator: A. Bojchevski
S. GÃ¼nnemann
dcterms:description: The complete version of the Cora dataset, forming a paper citation network where nodes correspond to papers and edges represent citations. Node attributes are created using the bag-of-words technique for titles and abstracts.
dcterms:title: Cora-Full

dcterms:creator: J. McAuley
R. Pandey
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A subset of Amazon's Electronics products, similar to Amazon-Clothing, where nodes represent products and edges connect products purchased together. Node features are derived from product descriptions.
dcterms:title: Amazon-Electronics

dcterms:creator: J. Tang
J. Zhang
L. Yao
J. Li
L. Zhang
Z. Su
dcterms:description: A citation network where papers are treated as nodes and citation links as edges. Node features are generated from abstracts using the bag-of-words approach, and labels represent the venues of papers.
dcterms:title: DBLP
